pages.text: An abundance of flowers of every type will grow in the area around the pyre, useful for creating such resources as $(l:resources/petals)petals$() or dyes, or even just for simple decoration.$(br2)$(info) $(l:spells/natures_scythe)Nature's Scythe$() makes clearing out tall grass before the ritual easy.$(br2)The exact flowers grown and the soils they grow upon can be configured with CraftTweaker.
As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier 0$() ritual, there are no additional requirements to complete this ritual.
